column1: #text=I visited the library and asked the main librarian where I could find the fiction books .
#text=I followed her instructions and then looked around the shelves for the mystery genre books .
#text=I browsed through the shelves of mystery books for a few minutes and picked out a few books that looked interesting .
#text=Then , I sat down in a comfy chair near the shelves and read the beginnings to the books I had chosen to see if I would really like them .
#text=I narrowed it down to one book that I found interesting and enjoyable to read .
#text=I placed the other books on a shelf to be returned to their proper place by the librarian .
#text=I took the book and went to the front of the library and pulled out my library card .
#text=I handed my library card and the book to the librarian and she scanned them both using her card scanner .
#text=She informed me of the due date of the book and I thanked her for her help .
#text=I left the library to go home .
